pr_title: Fix missing serializers when deserializing global loot modifiers

timeline.message: Fix missing serializers when deserializing global loot modifiers

timeline.bodyText: The GsonBuilder returned by LootSerializers.func_237387_b_ does not have a hierarchy adapter for ILootCondition. Is this a problem?
timeline.author: ichttt

replies.bodyText: Yes, it does, notice how func_237387_b_ first calls func_237386_a_
replies.author: diesieben07
